85 #include <explore/explore.h>

89 // Counter fuer Explore_Ende
90 int count_soar = 0;
92 inline static bool operator==(const geometry_msgs::Point& one,
93  const geometry_msgs::Point& two)
94 {
95  double dx = one.x - two.x;
96  double dy = one.y - two.y;
97  double dist = sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
98  return dist < 0.01;
99 }
100 
101 namespace explore
102 {
103 Explore::Explore()
104  : private_nh_("~")
105  , tf_listener_(ros::Duration(10.0))
106  , costmap_client_(private_nh_, relative_nh_, &tf_listener_)
107  , move_base_client_("move_base")
108  , prev_distance_(0)
109  , last_markers_count_(0)
110 {
111  double timeout;
112  double min_frontier_size;
113  private_nh_.param("planner_frequency", planner_frequency_, 1.0);
114  private_nh_.param("progress_timeout", timeout, 30.0);
115  progress_timeout_ = ros::Duration(timeout);
116  private_nh_.param("visualize", visualize_, false);
117  private_nh_.param("potential_scale", potential_scale_, 1e-3);
118  private_nh_.param("orientation_scale", orientation_scale_, 0.0);
119  private_nh_.param("gain_scale", gain_scale_, 1.0);
120  private_nh_.param("min_frontier_size", min_frontier_size, 0.5);
121 
122  search_ = frontier_exploration::FrontierSearch(costmap_client_.getCostmap(),
123  potential_scale_, gain_scale_,
124  min_frontier_size);
125 
126  if (visualize_) {
127  marker_array_publisher_ =
128  private_nh_.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>("frontiers", 10);
129  }
130 
131  ROS_INFO("Waiting to connect to move_base server");
132  move_base_client_.waitForServer();
133  ROS_INFO("Connected to move_base server");
134 
135  exploring_timer_ =
136  relative_nh_.createTimer(ros::Duration(1. / planner_frequency_),
137  [this](const ros::TimerEvent&) { makePlan(); });
138 }
139 
140 Explore::~Explore()
141 {
142  ROS_INFO("In deconstructor!");
143  //stop();
144 }
145 
146 void Explore::visualizeFrontiers(
147  const std::vector<frontier_exploration::Frontier>& frontiers)
148 {
149  std_msgs::ColorRGBA blue;
150  blue.r = 0;
151  blue.g = 0;
152  blue.b = 1.0;
153  blue.a = 1.0;
154  std_msgs::ColorRGBA red;
155  red.r = 1.0;
156  red.g = 0;
157  red.b = 0;
158  red.a = 1.0;
159  std_msgs::ColorRGBA green;
160  green.r = 0;
161  green.g = 1.0;
162  green.b = 0;
163  green.a = 1.0;
164 
165  ROS_DEBUG("visualising %lu frontiers", frontiers.size());
166  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray markers_msg;
167  std::vector<visualization_msgs::Marker>& markers = markers_msg.markers;
168  visualization_msgs::Marker m;
169 
170  m.header.frame_id = costmap_client_.getGlobalFrameID();
171  m.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
172  m.ns = "frontiers";
173  m.scale.x = 1.0;
174  m.scale.y = 1.0;
175  m.scale.z = 1.0;
176  m.color.r = 0;
177  m.color.g = 0;
178  m.color.b = 255;
179  m.color.a = 255;
180  // lives forever
181  m.lifetime = ros::Duration(0);
182  m.frame_locked = true;
183 
184  // weighted frontiers are always sorted
185  double min_cost = frontiers.empty() ? 0. : frontiers.front().cost;
186 
187  m.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
188  size_t id = 0;
189  for (auto& frontier : frontiers) {
190  m.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::POINTS;
191  m.id = int(id);
192  m.pose.position = {};
193  m.scale.x = 0.1;
194  m.scale.y = 0.1;
195  m.scale.z = 0.1;
196  m.points = frontier.points;
197  if (goalOnBlacklist(frontier.centroid)) {
198  m.color = red;
199  } else {
200  m.color = blue;
201  }
202  markers.push_back(m);
203  ++id;
204  m.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::SPHERE;
205  m.id = int(id);
206  m.pose.position = frontier.initial;
207  // scale frontier according to its cost (costier frontiers will be smaller)
208  double scale = std::min(std::abs(min_cost * 0.4 / frontier.cost), 0.5);
209  m.scale.x = scale;
210  m.scale.y = scale;
211  m.scale.z = scale;
212  m.points = {};
213  m.color = green;
214  markers.push_back(m);
215  ++id;
216  }
217  size_t current_markers_count = markers.size();
218 
219  // delete previous markers, which are now unused
220  m.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::DELETE;
221  for (; id < last_markers_count_; ++id) {
222  m.id = int(id);
223  markers.push_back(m);
224  }
225 
226  last_markers_count_ = current_markers_count;
227  marker_array_publisher_.publish(markers_msg);
228 }
229 
230 
231 
232 void Explore::makePlan()
233 {
234  costmap_2d::Costmap2D* costmap2d = costmap_client_.getCostmap(); // SOA we copied this to print out frontier size in correct dimension
235 
236  // find frontiers
237  auto pose = costmap_client_.getRobotPose();
238  // get frontiers sorted according to cost
239  auto frontiers = search_.searchFrom(pose.position);
240  ROS_DEBUG("found %lu frontiers", frontiers.size());
241  for (size_t i = 0; i < frontiers.size(); ++i) {
242  ROS_DEBUG("frontier %zd cost: %f", i, frontiers[i].cost);
243  ROS_DEBUG("frontier %zd size: %f", i, frontiers[i].size * costmap2d->getResolution());
244  }
245 
246  if (frontiers.empty()) {
247  ROS_INFO("Frontier list is empty");
248  stop();
249  return;
250  }
251 
252  // publish frontiers as visualization markers
253  if (visualize_) {
254  visualizeFrontiers(frontiers);
255  }
256 
257  // find non blacklisted frontier
258  auto frontier =
259  std::find_if_not(frontiers.begin(), frontiers.end(),
260  [this](const frontier_exploration::Frontier& f) {
261  return goalOnBlacklist(f.centroid);
262  });
263  if (frontier == frontiers.end()) {
264  ROS_INFO("Only blacklisted frontiers");
265  bool reset = false;
266 
267  for(int i=0; i < frontiers.size(); i++){
268  if(frontiers[i].size > 10/costmap2d->getResolution() ||
269  (frontiers[i].centroid.x > 0 && frontiers[i].centroid.x < 1) && (frontiers[i].centroid.y > -6.5 && frontiers[i].centroid.y < -5.5) ||
270  (frontiers[i].centroid.x > -1 && frontiers[i].centroid.x < 0) && (frontiers[i].centroid.y > 5.5 && frontiers[i].centroid.y < 6.5))
271  {
272  ROS_INFO("Sind in der if abfrage drinnen! Wir Resetten nichtmehr sondern sind fertig!");
273  // reset = false;
274  }
275  else{
276  ROS_INFO("Sind in der if abfrage drinnen! reset = true");
277  reset = true;
278  }
279  }
280  if((reset == true) && (count_soar < 5)){
281  frontier_blacklist_.clear();
282  ROS_INFO("Clear it and let's do it again!");
283  count_soar++;
284  ROS_INFO("Abbruch count: ");
285  std::cout << count_soar << std::endl;
286  makePlan();
287  return;
288  }
289  else{
290  ROS_INFO("Stop because reset false && cound_soar ");
291  std::cout <<"Reset = "<<reset<<" |||| count = "<< count_soar << std::endl;
292  stop();
293  return;
294  }
295  return;
296  }
297  geometry_msgs::Point target_position = frontier->centroid;
298 
299  // time out if we are not making any progress
300  bool same_goal = prev_goal_ == target_position;
301  prev_goal_ = target_position;
302  if (!same_goal || prev_distance_ > frontier->min_distance) {
303  // we have different goal or we made some progress = come closer to goal but on a luftline direction
304  last_progress_ = ros::Time::now();
305  prev_distance_ = frontier->min_distance;
306  }
307  // SOA function to blacklist frontiers out of the maze
308  if (target_position.x > 5.8 || target_position.y > 5.8 || target_position.x < -5.8 || target_position.y < -5.8)
309  {
310  frontier_blacklist_.push_back(target_position);
311  ROS_INFO("#");
312  ROS_INFO("#");
313  ROS_INFO(" XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX Frontier out of the Maze");
314  ROS_INFO("#");
315  ROS_INFO("#");
316  makePlan();
317  return;
318  }
319  if (frontier->size > 10/costmap2d->getResolution())
320  {
321  frontier_blacklist_.push_back(target_position);
322  ROS_INFO("#");
323  ROS_INFO("#");
324  ROS_INFO(" ###################### Frontier to Size to big");
325  ROS_INFO("#");
326  ROS_INFO("#");
327  makePlan();
328  return;
329  }
330  if ((target_position.x > 0 && target_position.x < 1) && (target_position.y > -6.5 && target_position.y < -5.5))
331  {
332  frontier_blacklist_.push_back(target_position);
333  ROS_INFO("#");
334  ROS_INFO("#");
335  ROS_INFO(" ###################### Frontier was 0.5, -6 exit");
336  ROS_INFO("#");
337  ROS_INFO("#");
338  makePlan();
339  return;
340  }
341  if ((target_position.x > -1 && target_position.x < 0) && (target_position.y > 5.5 && target_position.y < 6.5))
342  {
343  frontier_blacklist_.push_back(target_position);
344  ROS_INFO("#");
345  ROS_INFO("#");
346  ROS_INFO(" ###################### Frontier was -0.5, 6 exit");
347  ROS_INFO("#");
348  ROS_INFO("#");
349  makePlan();
350  return;
351  }
352 
353  // black list if we've made no progress for a long time
354  if (ros::Time::now() - last_progress_ > progress_timeout_) {
355  frontier_blacklist_.push_back(target_position);
356  ROS_INFO("#");
357  ROS_INFO("#");
358  ROS_INFO(" YYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY I WAITED TOO LONG!!!! Adding current goal to black list");
359  ROS_INFO("#");
360  ROS_INFO("#");
361  makePlan();
362  return;
363  }
364 
365  // we don't need to do anything if we still pursuing the same goal
366  if (same_goal) {
367  return;
368  }
369 
370 // Gauss_rauschen
371 
372 const double mean = 0.0;
373 const double stddev = 0.05;
374 //std::default_random_engine generator;
375 std::mt19937 generator(std::random_device{}());
376 
377 std::normal_distribution<double> dist(mean, stddev);
378  ROS_INFO("target_pos: x=%2.3f y=%2.3f", target_position.x, target_position.y);
379 
380 target_position.x=target_position.x+dist(generator);
381 target_position.y=target_position.y+dist(generator);
382  ROS_INFO("target_pos+noise: x=%2.3f y=%2.3f", target_position.x, target_position.y);
383 
384 
385  // send goal to move_base if we have something new to pursue
386  move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal goal;
387  goal.target_pose.pose.position = target_position;
388  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation.w = 1.;
389  goal.target_pose.header.frame_id = costmap_client_.getGlobalFrameID();
390  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
391  move_base_client_.sendGoal(
392  goal, [this, target_position](
393  const actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState& status,
394  const move_base_msgs::MoveBaseResultConstPtr& result) {
395  reachedGoal(status, result, target_position);
396  });
397 }
398 
399 bool Explore::goalOnBlacklist(const geometry_msgs::Point& goal)
400 {
401  constexpr static size_t tolerace = 10; // default value = 5
402  costmap_2d::Costmap2D* costmap2d = costmap_client_.getCostmap();
403 
404  // check if a goal is on the blacklist for goals that we're pursuing
405  for (auto& frontier_goal : frontier_blacklist_) {
406  double x_diff = fabs(goal.x - frontier_goal.x);
407  double y_diff = fabs(goal.y - frontier_goal.y);
408 
409  if (x_diff < tolerace * costmap2d->getResolution() &&
410  y_diff < tolerace * costmap2d->getResolution())
411  return true;
412  }
413  return false;
414 }
415 
416 void Explore::reachedGoal(const actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState& status,
417  const move_base_msgs::MoveBaseResultConstPtr&,
418  const geometry_msgs::Point& frontier_goal)
419 {
420  ROS_DEBUG("Reached goal with status: %s", status.toString().c_str());
421  if (status == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::ABORTED) {
422  frontier_blacklist_.push_back(frontier_goal);
423  ROS_INFO("#");
424  ROS_INFO(" ZZZZZZ Reached goal aborted! Adding current goal to black list");
425  ROS_INFO("#");
426  }
427 
428  // find new goal immediatelly regardless of planning frequency.
429  // execute via timer to prevent dead lock in move_base_client (this is
430  // callback for sendGoal, which is called in makePlan). the timer must live
431  // until callback is executed.
432  oneshot_ = relative_nh_.createTimer(
433  ros::Duration(0, 0), [this](const ros::TimerEvent&) { makePlan(); },
434  true);
435 }
436 
437 void Explore::start()
438 {
439  exploring_timer_.start();
440 }
441 
442 void Explore::stop()
443 {
444  move_base_client_.cancelAllGoals();
445  exploring_timer_.stop();
446  ROS_INFO("Exploration stopped.");
447  ros::param::set("exploring" , false); // for bash script indication
448  ros::shutdown(); // von SOA Team
449 }
450 
451 } // namespace explore
452 
453 int main(int argc, char** argv)
454 {
455  ros::init(argc, argv, "explore");
456  if (ros::console::set_logger_level(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME,
457  ros::console::levels::Info)) { //Debug
458  ros::console::notifyLoggerLevelsChanged();
459  }
460  explore::Explore explore;
461  ros::spin();
462 
463  return 0;
464 }
